attributes.action: create a law banning the wearing of pajamas in shops and public buildings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to introduce a new law that takes a three tier approach in terms of punishment re: the wearing of pajamas in public places -
1: The naming and shaming of first time offenders
2: Severe fines or imprisonment of repeat offenders
3: Death by hanging for persistent offenders

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
